full_summary:
### ATIS Instructors Tender Announcement

#### Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a tender for the provision of professional services to support the design, development, delivery, evaluation, and provision of training activities for the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) in Trenton, Ontario. The successful contractor will provide ATIS Instructors to support Aerospace Telecommunications Engineering Support Squadron (ATESS) in delivering training activities.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Number:** W3474-230009
* **Tender Name:** ATIS Instructors
* **Publication Date:** December 20, 2022
* **Closing Date:** January 20, 2023 14:00 EST
* **Contract Term:** February 28, 2023 to March 31, 2024 with optional one-year extension periods until March 31, 2027

#### Services Required

The contractor will provide four (4) ATIS Instructors to support ATESS in designing, developing, delivering, evaluating, and providing training activities for the CAF. The scope of work includes:

* Designing and developing training activities for the CAF
* Delivering training activities to the CAF
* Evaluating the effectiveness of training activities
* Providing training materials and resources to the CAF

#### Notice Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) among others
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Contactor Information:**
	+ Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
	+ Contact: Christopher Harvey, christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Contact Information

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions to the PSPC by January 20, 2023 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Notice Reference Numbers

* **Reference Number:** WS3786711438-Doc3786956177
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3786711438
